EmailTemplate.name: Reminder for Order Drawings
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Drawings Not Uploaded for Order {!Order.OrderNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Selenia,
This is a reminder that the requested drawings for {!Order.SO_Numbers_for_Drawings__c} for {!Account.Name} have not been uploaded in the last 7 days.
Kindly review and take the necessary action.
